sections.general:
SALES CONSULTANT, INTERIOR DESIGNER
Professional Summary
Results-oriented sales professional eager to join a reputable organization. Hardworking consultant gifted at turning prospects into clients by
delivering exceptional presentations. Engaging and personable with expertise managing key milestones and delivering exemplary customer service.
Highly enthusiastic with ability to absorb information rapidly and make a correct response.
sections.skills:
Persuasive communication
Prospect qualification
Retention strategies
Exceptional Customer Service
Sales
